name: Money Drop
description:
# Objective

Catch as much money as you can while avoiding the bombs.

# Controls  

Left And Right Buttons to move
Space to pause

This game is so old :) it requires VB6 controls that are no longer included with Windows.

If you receive a missing "COMCTL32.OCX" error you will need to register the included OCX file
by running the command "regsvr32 comctl32.ocx" as an administrator.
